title: These are the best cheap CPUs you can buy in 2022
content:
Picking the right processor for your PC mostly depends on what you plan on using the computer for. While it might be tempting to buy the latest and the fastest hardware that you can afford, it’s always best to figure out your use case to avoid investing in high-end components that you don’t necessarily need.

The post These are the best cheap CPUs you can buy in 2022 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: If you in the market to buy an affordable processor for you PC, then we've got just the right info for you. Here's a list of the best cheap CPUs you can buy in 2022.
